name: Ruby
description:
The Ruby plugin extends IntelliJ IDEA with the full-scale functionality for Ruby development. It provides the same functionality as RubyMine, the standalone IDE for Ruby developers. The Ruby plugin works with Ruby 2.2.0+, JRuby 9.3+, Rubinius, and TruffleRuby.

Ruby-specific features

  • Coding assistance:
    • Code completion
    • Refactorings
    • Code styling and formatting
    • Code documentation
    • Code inspections and quick-fixes
    • Live templates
  • Navigation and search:
    • Go to declaration
    • Find usages
    • Search everywhere
    • Structure view
  • Ruby on Rails
    • Rails-aware code maintenance
    • ERB/HAML/Slim/Liquid editor
    • MVC-based navigation
    • Rails generators
    • Rails internationalization (i18n) support
    • Model dependency diagrams
  • Ruby tools
    • Bundler integration
    • Version managers and gemsets support
    • RBS integration
    • Rake support
    • RuboCop integration
    • Built-in IRB and Rails consoles
    • Integrated Ruby debugger
    • Integrated Ruby profiler

The plugin is only available in the Ultimate edition of IntelliJ IDEA.
